title: The War of the Worlds
author: Wells, H. G. (Herbert George)
excerpt: This audio reading of The War of the Worlds is read by
content:
This audio reading of The War of the Worlds is read by

Stephan Möbius, 
Chris Goringe, 
Peter Yearsley, 
Joseph Morris, 
Kara Shallenberg, 
Mike Shapiro, 
Tony Gray, 
Kristin Luoma, 
Chip, 
Kathleen (Kathy) P. King, 
Jean Crevier
